# Getting to know about Tara Zhan

<img src="id_image.jpg" width="70%"/>

## About myself

My name is Fei (Tara) Zhan, UNI: fz2377, currently a Master of Science
student from the department of epidemiology at Mailman School of Public
Health. I am interested in the field of chronic epidemic disease,
especially curious about the relationship about how can nutrition in
molecular level cause or induce diseases.

I am taking this course to further enhance my coding skills.

## Education

I am graduated from University of California, Santa Barbara, with a
Bachelor of Science degree in Biological Science.

## Skills

Exceptional interpersonal skills, adept at networking and effectively
communicating with diverse groups of people. Strong presentation skills
and a collaborative team player.

Proficient in Microsoft Office Suite, Python and R programming
languages.

Skilled in RNAi, PCR, GFP analysis, and proficient in light and electron
microscopy techniques.

## Fun facts

I love skiing, drawing, soccer, hiking, shopping, and party.

I have a Devon Rex cat, named Bobby.
